title: Pumps, manpower deployed twice overnight to clear waterlogging at Bharat Mandapam
comments: They successfully hid the slums but failed to hide poor infrastructure. Prior hosts of G20 managed the events in way less money than what the government of India has spent.
The rest of the money is for personal use. Cmon mate!
